name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Revival ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2024】 [fcFwvfav6mQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Song performance of 'mumei' by Tsunomaki Watame and Nanashi Mumei.

subtitles.original: mumei / 作詞・作曲・編曲：TKN
subtitles.english: mumei / Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: TKN

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまった　ことだけを覚えている
subtitles.english: I only remember the things I've forgotten

subtitles.original: ぽっかりと空いた　穴の先で君と出会った
subtitles.english: I met you beyond the gaping hole

subtitles.original: 名前も顔も分からない君なんだか
subtitles.english: Your name and face, I don't know them, but somehow...

subtitles.original: 懐かしいような気がした
subtitles.english: I felt like I missed you

subtitles.original: 互いに穴を埋めてゆくように
subtitles.english: As if filling each other's holes

subtitles.original: ふざけ合って　笑い合って
subtitles.english: Messing around, laughing together

subtitles.original: セカイ　愛のどこかにいる君のため
subtitles.english: World, for you, who is somewhere in love

subtitles.original: イマ　生きているよ僕ら
subtitles.english: Now, we are living

subtitles.original: 無名のまま
subtitles.english: Still nameless

subtitles.original: 例えばこれが　映し出された幻でも
subtitles.english: Even if this is just a projected illusion

subtitles.original: 確かに感じる　今君がそこにいること
subtitles.english: I certainly feel that you are there now

subtitles.original: 名前も顔も分からない君
subtitles.english: Your name and face, I don't know them

subtitles.original: サヨナラしてしまえば終わりだ
subtitles.english: If we say goodbye, it's over

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃ穴は大きくなる
subtitles.english: Without you, the hole will grow larger

subtitles.original: 構わないさ　すぐ見つかる
subtitles.english: I don't mind, I'll find you soon

subtitles.original: セカイ　愛のどこかにいる君はどこ
subtitles.english: World, where are you, who is somewhere in love

subtitles.original: イマ　ここにいるよ私
subtitles.english: Now, I am here

subtitles.original: 無名
subtitles.english: Mumei

subtitles.original: 辺りは一面真っ暗な世界　真っ逆さまに落ちていく
subtitles.english: The surroundings are a pitch-black world, falling headfirst

subtitles.original: 無名だからこの世界には　忘れられ消えちゃうの
subtitles.english: Because I'm nameless, in this world, I'll be forgotten and disappear

subtitles.original: それでも君が求めるのなら　この胸に空いた穴に今
subtitles.english: Still, if you wish for it, now in this hole in my chest

subtitles.original: 響け私私を通り抜け　地の果てまで今君のもとへと行く
subtitles.english: Resonate through me, pass through me, to the ends of the earth, I'll go to you now

subtitles.original: セカイ　愛のどこかにいる君のため
subtitles.english: World, for you, who is somewhere in love

subtitles.original: イマ　生きていくよ私
subtitles.english: Now, I will live on

subtitles.original: 無名のまま
subtitles.english: Still nameless
